keyPolicies.policyTitle: Campaigning for more police on our streets
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure everyone feels safe with 85 new Police Officers on the beat in Derbyshire by the end of 2020/21, securing Erewash's fair share.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Honouring the result of the 2016 referendum by getting Brexit done
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Consistently voted to get the UK out of the EU and deliver on the 2016 referendum result in Erewash, and asking for support to finish the job.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Securing more investment for our town centres
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Delivered free parking and over £25m worth of new investment for historic market towns while continuing to fight for further investment.

issues.brexitEurope: Consistently voted to get the UK out of the EU and deliver on the 2016 referendum result in Erewash
issues.economy: Delivered free parking and over £25m worth of new investment for historic market towns
